common.dropFilesHere: Drop files here or click to select

header.slogan: Edit, convert and sign PDFs in seconds. No signup, no payment, no watermarks. Completely free and unlimited for everyone.

merge.name: Merge PDFs
merge.description: Combine multiple PDF files into a single ordered document.

split.name: Split PDF
split.description: Extract specific pages or split your document into multiple parts.

compress.name: Compress PDF
compress.description: Reduce file size while maintaining the best possible quality.

rotate.name: Rotate PDF
rotate.description: Rotate your PDF pages. Save permanently right now.

delete.name: Delete Pages
delete.description: Remove unwanted pages from your PDF document.

reorder.name: Reorder
reorder.description: Organize your PDF pages by simply dragging and dropping.

pdf-to-image.name: PDF to Image
pdf-to-image.description: Convert PDF pages to JPG or PNG images.

image-to-pdf.name: Image to PDF
image-to-pdf.description: Convert your images (JPG, PNG) to PDF files.

watermark.name: Watermark
watermark.description: Add text or image watermark to your PDF.

page-numbers.name: Page Numbers
page-numbers.description: Add page numbering to your PDF with ease.

annotate.name: Annotate PDF
annotate.description: Add notes, highlights and drawings to your PDF.

protect.name: Protect PDF
protect.description: Add password and encrypt your important PDF files.

unlock.name: Unlock PDF
unlock.description: Remove password and protection from PDF files.

landing.heroDescription: Edit, convert and sign PDFs in seconds. No signup, no payment, no watermarks. Completely free and unlimited for everyone.
landing.powerfulToolsDescription: Choose the ideal tool for your needs
landing.featuresDescription: Our platform offers advanced features that were previously only available in expensive and complex software.

footer.description: The best online platform to manage your PDF documents quickly and securely.

annotate.title: Annotate PDF
annotate.description: Add highlights, drawings, shapes, text, notes and more to your PDF files
annotate.failedToLoad: Failed to load PDF. Please try again.
annotate.failedToSave: Failed to save PDF. Please try again.

messages.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only {{types}} are allowed
